annotations.description: In the second episode of our new series on Nightcap cocktails, celebrating the release of Kara Newman's new book, we present to you this lovely and easy sipp...
annotations.title: Nightcap: Déjà Vu All Over Again

textContent:
1oz (30ml) Aperol
1oz (30ml) Lillet Blanc
1oz (30ml) Amaro Nonino
1 Barspoon Lemon Juice
Top Soda Water
Lemon Twist

Stir in highball over ice. Top with soda and garnish

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ln8Xj678wbc
title: Déjà Vu All Over Again
